channel.title: CVE Feed for Google -- Android Google Search App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google -- Android Google Search App

item.title: CVE-2022-29580|2024-08-03T06:26:06.280Z -- google -- android%20google%20search%20app
item.description: There exists a path traversal vulnerability in the Android Google Search app. This is caused by the incorrect usage of uri.getLastPathSegment. A symbolic encoded string can bypass the path logic to get access to unintended directories. An attacker can manipulate paths that could lead to code execution on the device. We recommend upgrading beyond version 13.41
